__e: Cliff, what do I have to say to make you stop talking?
Yeah. You know, I actually once thought of asking Cliff what it all meant, but then it occurred to me he might tell me.
Marc, you proposed to Cliff, which, I have to say, I thought was a little weird considering that you were so freaked out about moving in with him, and now you never wanna talk about it.
Cliff, uh, you are going to pay me for this job, aren't you?
Cliff, why do you have to do what she says?
Cliff, you have no proof of anything and I will not...
It has nothing to do with you.
And you say you're just friends, but have you told Cliff?
Just keep it in that position. I see Cliff and I can not tell you that basketball team was or what he did for a living or what ago now because in truth I do not care.
I did talk to Cliff, and the great news is that he said he would help me with my taxes.
-He seems fine. A little tired, maybe. -It's more than that.
But why would somebody go after the reverend and Cliff on the very same night?
I need you to put me in touch with Cliff Barnes... As soon as possible.
If you're not happy with them, I'm more than happy to tell the world what you did to Cliff Barnes.
I mean, the fact that you kept from me that you're Cliff Barnes' daughter proves that our marriage was a sham from the start.
